.table mother
----
digraph G {"0" [label="mother"]}

.table father
----
digraph G {"0" [label="mother"]; "1" [label="father"]}

matGramp{child: A, grandfather: C} :-
  mother{child: A, mother: B} & father{child: B, father: C}.
----
digraph G {
  "0" [label="mother"];
  "1" [label="father"];
  "2" [label="matGramp: Union"];
  "3" [label="Join(foo == bar)"];
  "0" -> "3" [];
  "1" -> "3" [];
  "3" -> "2" []
}
